TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void SendCompletedEventHandler(object sender, AsyncCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed SendCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub SendCompletedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As AsyncCompletedEventArgs)
public delegate void SendCompletedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, AsyncCompletedEventArgs ^ e);

summary.span: Représente la méthode qui gérera l'événement .

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Le délégué est utilisé pour gérer les événements qui se produisent lorsque le classe termine l’envoi asynchrone d’un message électronique à l’aide la (méthode).The delegate is used to handle events that occur when the class finishes asynchronously sending an email message using the method. ## Examples L’exemple de code suivant illustre l’envoi d’un message électronique asynchrone.The following code example demonstrates sending an email message asynchronously. Il utilise un pour appeler le `SendCompletedCallback` méthode pour gérer événements.It uses a to invoke the `SendCompletedCallback` method to handle events. [!code-cpp[NclMailASync#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclMailASync/cpp/mailasync.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NclMailASync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclMailASync/CS/mailasync.cs#1)] [!code-vb[NclMailASync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclMailASync/vb/mailasync.vb#1)]
